dialogue: This week we introduced Tina the brittle tech writer to the strip.
Tina is dysfunctional like everybody here except me.
Send your opinions by e-mail to scottadams@aol.com
It's the only way we can learn.
A. Women should only be portrayed as lawyers and starship captains.
C. Tina should be treated with the same dignity as Dilbert and Wally.
